liquidity.removeDesc: Remove liquidity to receive tokens back
liquidity.addDesc: Add liquidity to earn from commissions
liquidity.descHint: When you add liquidity, you are given pool tokens that represent your share.
liquidity.yourActivePositions:
Your active liquidity positions 
 will appear here.
liquidity.desc: By adding liquidity you'll earn up to 0.2% of all trades on this pair proportional to your share of the pool. Fees are added to the pool, accrue in real time and can be claimed by withdrawing your liquidity.

remove.confirmationMessage:
Are you sure you
 want to remove liquidity?

confirm.additionalProvideMessage: You need to additionally transfer {{amount, string}} {{symbol, string}} to complete the liquidity provision
confirm.activationProvideMessage: You need to transfer to complete liquidity provision
